[{"wordEn":"easy:   cheap, easy","wordAn":"múra","langSubgroup":"WMP","langName":"Tagalog","wordEnLong":"cheap, inexpensive","setnote":"Based on the Tagalog, Ngaju Dayak, Malagasy, Toba Batak and Javanese forms given here, and Malay mudah, Dempwolff (1934-1938) posited ‘Uraustronesisch’ *mudaq ‘easy; cheap’.  However, under this reconstruction the following forms are irregular: Tagalog múra (expected **múraɁ) Malay murah (expected mudah, which also occurs), and Karo Batak, Sundanese murah (expected **mudah).
